name: Roasted Delicata Squash
author: Chef John
summary: You don't have to peel delicata squash to make these roasted squash slices. Serve warm as a side dish, or at room temp as a snack with a spicy aioli dipping sauce.
ingredients: 1 large delicata squash - ends trimmed, halved lengthwise, seeded
directions: Place squash halves cut side down on a cutting board
Drizzle with olive oil; add salt and cayenne pepper
Toss to coat squash with oil
Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat
Arrange squash pieces in a single layer on prepared baking sheet
Place in preheated oven until bottom of slices is browned and squash is tender, 12 to 18 minutes
